mr.robotto.core

Class MrObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • mr.robotto.core.MrObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MrCamera, MrLight, MrModel, MrScene

    public abstract class MrObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for MrRobotto Object hierarchy. This class provides access to the user to control an object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MrObject.MrObjectBuilder
      Created by aaron on 16/06/2015.
